description: Roof extension to rear outrigger incorporating a Juliet balcony; and alterations to existing rear dormer roof extension Juliet balcony
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with
Existing Ground Floor Plan, Drawing No. PP-01, dated 12 December 2024
Existing First Floor Plan, Drawing No. PP-02, dated 12 December 2024
Existing Loft Floor Plan, Drawing No. PP-03, dated 12 December 2024
Existing Rooftop Plan, Drawing No. PP-04, dated 12 December 2024
Existing Elevations, Drawing No. PP-05, dated 12 December 2024
Proposed Ground Floor Plan, Drawing No. PP-06, dated 12 December 2024
Proposed First Floor Plan, Drawing No. PP-07, dated 12 December 2024
Proposed Loft Floor Plan, Drawing No. PP-08, dated 12 December 2024
Proposed  Rooftop Plan, Drawing No. PP-09, dated 12 December 2024
Proposed Elevations, Drawing No. PP-10, dated 12 December 2024

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2024).
